Completely tickled my funny bone, this one:
 
 
 "If evolution is right, then an antelope's backside ought to have a picture of a chair on it. Because if there's one thing hundreds of years of circus entertainment has taught us, it's that lions are afraid of chairs."
 
 
 Also, JPSartre12, your inbox is full and I can't reply to your PM. Suffice it to say, I'm fine with your selection of judges and I'll see you (and Marc9000) on Monday.
Wait a minute, how can that be funny? Why didn't God put a picture of a chair on a deer's butt? I'll admit, the joke is ok, but its a horrible political joke.

Why didn't God put a picture of a chair on a deer's butt?
Because deer don't live in Africa.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  On-topic joke
